Posts.Content: Hi Highland Mum, I am seeing my Oncologist for the first time tomorrow evening so am hoping to find out when my Chemo will start. So far everything has been a 2 week wait between each stage and its the waiting that I find so frustrating. I just want to know when my chemo will start so I can make plans for work and christmas etc. I will reply with what I know tomorrow x
Posts.Title: Waiting!
